title: CreateEventConfig
description: This schema defines eventConfig for receiving events from OpenMetadata

name.description: Unique name of the application receiving eventConfig events.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this eventConfig.

endpoint.description: Endpoint to receive the eventConfig events over POST requests.

eventFilters.description: Event filters to filter for desired events.

batchSize.description: Maximum number of events sent in a batch (Default 10).

enabled.description: When set to `true`, the eventConfig event notification is enabled. Set it to `false` to disable the subscription. (Default `true`)

secretKey.description: Secret set by the eventConfig client used for computing HMAC SHA256 signature of eventConfig payload and sent in `X-OM-Signature` header in POST requests to publish the events.
